member.name: T:qbo.DecisionWeb.Decision
member.summary: Class for managing

member.name: P:qbo.DecisionWeb.Decision.BasePage
member.summary: Name of the implementing page; used to determine starting point of Operation.

member.name: P:qbo.DecisionWeb.Decision.BaseObject
member.summary: Return the base object a handler is wrapping. E.g. Contact.ashx wraps a qbo.Application.ContactObject. E.g. Loan.ashx wraps a qbo.Mortgage.Servicing.LoanObject.

member.name: M:qbo.DecisionWeb.Decision.ProcessRequestAsync(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Processes inbound requests. This method should be overridden by derived classes to handle custom class methods. E.g. Contact.ashx should override to bind a Geocode operation to the qbo.Application.ContactObject.Geocode method.

member.name: M:qbo.DecisionWeb.ImportFormTemplate.ReadXml(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Streams an XSLT to the browser for use with designers. Must specify an XsltType (Select | Edit | Import | Render).

member.name: M:qbo.DecisionWeb.ImportFormTemplate.WriteXml(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Writes an XSLT to the underlying attachment for use with designers. Must specify an XsltType (Select | Edit | Import | Render).
